item.title: Solving Network Connectivity for MDE and MDI
item.description: Hi, I’m Will Sykes, a Senior Security Researcher in Microsoft IR. My colleagues and I specialize in helping customers with incident response and compromise recovery. In our work with customers who’ve been the victim of cyberattack, we often must solve connectivity issues to support tools in a hybrid cloud configuration. Hybrid Cloud Challenges In today’s IT world we’re now implementing and integrating services that leverage cloud computing components. Correctly securing this often defies the adage of “never allow internet connectivity to sensitive systems” and can pose challenges to security...
